Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan’s defeat against USA was a shock, but Gary Kirsten believes his players have moved forward and are now focused on the challenge against India.
The pitch will be difficult to bat on, and bowlers from both sides will have an advantage.
India’s captain Rohit Sharma acknowledged the need to assess the wicket quickly and adapt accordingly.
Both teams have contrasting forms heading into the match.
India has won two of their last three T20I series, while Pakistan has had a tough start with losses to England and Ireland.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Nassau County Stadium has steadily improved over the past four games but remains unpredictable.
There is a forecast for rain in the morning, which could affect the match.
